casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 13, 2011

[Cite as 06/13/2011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-2835.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1842. State v. Morris.

Medina App. No. 09CA0022-M. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Medina County.

Upon consideration of appellee’s motion for appointment of counsel, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted and that David C. Sheldon is appointed to represent appellee.
